code: import Swal from'sweetalert2';export var setCategory=function setCategory(category){return{type:"SET_CATEGORY",category:category};};export var setToken=function setToken(token,id){return{type:'SET_TOKEN',token:token,id:id};};export var setUser=function setUser(user){return{type:"SET_USER",user:user};};export var createUser=function createUser(user){return function(dispatch){fetch('https://peaceful-atoll-37638.herokuapp.com/users',{method:'POST',headers:{'content-type':"application/json",'accept':"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(user)}).then(function(r){return r.json();}).then(function(data){if(data.errors){Swal.fire({icon:'warning',title:'Oops...',text:data.errors});}else{localStorage.token=data.token;localStorage.id=data.user_id;dispatch(setToken(data.token,data.user_id));dispatch(authUser(localStorage.token,localStorage.id));}});};};export var loginUser=function loginUser(user){return function(dispatch){fetch("https://peaceful-atoll-37638.herokuapp.com/login",{method:'POST',headers:{"content-type":"application/json","accept":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(user)}).then(function(r){return r.json();}).then(function(data){if(data.errors){Swal.fire({icon:'warning',title:'Oops...',text:data.errors});}else{localStorage.token=data.token;localStorage.id=data.id;dispatch(setToken(data.token,data.id));dispatch(authUser(localStorage.token,localStorage.id));}});};};export var authUser=function authUser(token,id){return function(dispatch){fetch("https://peaceful-atoll-37638.herokuapp.com/users/".concat(id),{headers:{"Authorization":token}}).then(function(r){return r.json();}).then(function(data){dispatch(setUser(data));});};};export var LogOut=function LogOut(){return{type:"LOG_OUT"};};export var updateSuccess=function updateSuccess(){return{type:'UPDATE_SUCCESS',updated:true};};export var changeUpdateState=function changeUpdateState(){return{type:'CHANGE_UPDATE_STATE',updated:false};};export var updateUser=function updateUser(user){return function(dispatch){fetch("https://peaceful-atoll-37638.herokuapp.com/users/".concat(user.id),{method:"PATCH",headers:{"content-type":"application/json","accept":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify(user)}).then(function(r){return r.json();}).then(function(data){if(data.errors){Swal.fire({icon:'warning',title:'Oops...',text:data.errors});}else{dispatch(setUser(data));}});};};export var deleteUser=function deleteUser(user){return function(dispatch){fetch("https://peaceful-atoll-37638.herokuapp.com/users/".concat(user.id),{method:'DELETE'}).then(function(r){return r.json();}).then(function(data){localStorage.removeItem('token');localStorage.removeItem('id');Swal.fire({icon:'success',title:'Sad to see you go!',text:'User is deleted!'});dispatch(setToken(null,null));dispatch(authUser(null,null));});};};export var setDate=function setDate(date){return{type:'DATE',date:date};};export var setPickedUserId=function setPickedUserId(id){return{type:'PICKED_USER',pickedId:id};};export var createAppointment=function createAppointment(date,userId01,userId02){return function(dispatch){fetch('https://peaceful-atoll-37638.herokuapp.com/appointments',{method:'POST',headers:{"content-type":"application/json","accept":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({client_id:userId01,provider_id:userId02,appoint_date:date})}).then(function(r){return r.json();}).then(function(data){if(data.errors){Swal.fire({icon:'warning',title:'Oops...',text:data.errors});}else{Swal.fire({icon:'success',title:"Appointment for ".concat(data.appoint_date," is scheduled!")});dispatch(authUser(localStorage.token,localStorage.id));}});};};export var deleteAppointment=function deleteAppointment(id){return function(dispatch){fetch("https://peaceful-atoll-37638.herokuapp.com/appointments/".concat(id),{method:"DELETE"}).then(function(r){return r.json();}).then(function(data){Swal.fire({icon:'success',text:'Appointment is canceled!'});dispatch(authUser(localStorage.token,localStorage.id));});};};export var updateAppointment=function updateAppointment(id,date){return function(dispatch){fetch("https://peaceful-atoll-37638.herokuapp.com/appointments/".concat(id),{method:"PATCH",headers:{"content-type":"application/json","accept":"application/json"},body:JSON.stringify({appoint_date:date})}).then(function(r){return r.json();}).then(function(data){Swal.fire({icon:'success',title:'Schedule is updated!'});dispatch(authUser(localStorage.token,localStorage.id));});};};export var setSource=function setSource(source){return{type:'SEARCH_SOURCE',source:source};};export var newSource=function newSource(){return function(dispatch){fetch('https://peaceful-atoll-37638.herokuapp.com/users').then(function(r){return r.json();}).then(function(data){return dispatch(setSource(data));});};};export var setSearchedUser=function setSearchedUser(user){return{type:"SEARCHED_USER",searchedUser:user};};export var setSearchedValue=function setSearchedValue(value){return{type:'SET_SEARCHED_VALUE',value:value};};
